description: Amaze File Manager is an open-source file manager that Android users can use to find, cut, copy, delete, compress, and encrypt files. When Amaze File Manager encrypts a file, it produces an AZE file. For example, FileInfo.pdf becomes FileInfo.pdf.aze when encrypted by Amaze.
Amaze can also be used to encrypt an entire folder. In this case, the folder's name is appended with .aze .
